directions.text: Heat Oven to 500° with iron skillet inside.
Let steaks come to room temperature, rub with spices then coat with oil.
Cook each side of the steaks on a high stove top burner for 30 sec a side.
Flip steaks and place them in oven and cook them 2 min a side.
If steaks do not meet 130° internally keep cooking them until they do at 2 min intervals.
Let steaks cool down under foil for 3 min after temperature is reached.
